name: No Strangers In!
description:
No Strangers In! is a story-based RPG Maker horror game filled with puzzles and other features. The game’s duration is around 30 minutes, and the players can replay the game to obtain different endings!

The Story:

Vina is a lonely girl who always lives away from the rest of the world safe behind the walls of her house and her parents. All that would soon change when her parents needed to go and leave her on her own just for a night. Things would take for the worst as she would find herself trapped with numerous monsters. Will she get out of the very place she has seek protection from the outside world? Or will she succumb to the fate that awaits her inside?    You Decide!

Download Instruction:

  1. Download the game from the page
  2. Extract the ZIP file into a folder
  3. Run the game app
  4. Enjoy the game!

Controls:

Arrow Keys Move around Shift + arrow keys Sprint Space/Enter Interact with objects

Features:

  • 2 different endings
  • Original soundtrack

Credits:

  • Resources from RPG Maker MV
  • Galv's RPG Maker title plugin (MV Custom Title | Galv's RPG Maker Scripts & Plugins (galvs-scripts.com))
  • Self-made resources.
